titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the right worshipful the Deputy-Governour, and the Company of Merchants trading to the Levant-seas, at St Bartholemew-Exchange, May 1. 1689 By Edward Smyth, A.M. Fellow of Trinity-Colledge near Dublin; and preacher to the factory at Smyrna. Imprimatur, May 28. 1689. Hen. Wharton, R.R. in Christo P. ac D.D. Wilhelmo Archiep. Cant. à sacris domest.
titleStmt.author: Smyth, Edward, 1665-1720.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Sam. Crouch, at the corner of Pope's-Head-Ally, over-against the Royal Exchange in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Errata at the foot of the final page.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..

place.placeName: the corner of Pope's-Head-Ally, over-against the Royal Exchange in Cornhil
